app

Class ControllerBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.ControllerBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AboutWindowController, ClosingWindowController, ForceQuitWindowController, MainWindowController, SavingWindowController, SettingsWindowController, WelcomeWindowController

    public abstract class ControllerBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    The base controller class for all controller classes in the application.

    It provides a common interface for initializing controller classes.
